aboutData:
*About the application*  
*Voicify* application is an innovative tool for converting voice to text accurately and quickly. Whether you want to record audio directly using the microphone or upload audio files from your device, the application provides you with the perfect solution. After converting audio to text, you can copy the text, share it, or even upload it as a PDF file.

*Our advantages*  
- Easily convert audio to text via microphone or upload audio files.
- Copy the text and share it or upload it as a PDF.
- The ability to use ChatGPT to edit or improve texts.(in progress)

*Our team*  
I'm Ahmed Saeed, a Flutter app developer, specializing in creating innovative and easy-to-use apps. I always strive to provide software solutions that improve the user experience and effectively meet their needs.

*Our mission and vision*  
We aim to make it easy to convert audio to text and improve productivity by providing powerful and simple tools. Our vision is to make the app a comprehensive tool for managing converted texts and provide additional features using AI.

*Contact us*  
If you have any questions or suggestions, do not hesitate to contact us.
